mapper.update: UPDATE theaterinfo SET con_no=#{con_no} WHERE mt20id =#{mt20id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM theaterinfo WHERE prfnm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT distinct(con_no),theaterinfo.poster,theaterinfo.prfnm,theaterinfo.mt20id,theaterinfo.genrenm FROM theaterinfo INNER JOIN board USING(con_no) where genrenm=#{genrenm};
select * from board inner join theaterinfo using(con_no) inner join member_tbl using(mem_no) WHERE mt20id=#{mt20id};
select count(*) from board inner join theaterinfo using(con_no) WHERE mt20id=#{mt20id} and genrenm=#{genrenm};

select C.* from(select A.* from(select b.board_no,b.title,b.review,b.writedate,b.star_rate,m.nickname from board b inner join movieinfo using(con_no) inner join member_tbl m using(mem_no) WHERE mt20id=#{mt20id} and genrenm=#{genrenm} order by board_no desc) A LIMIT #{totalRecord}) C LIMIT #{startRecord},#{onePageRecord};
